com.orchestranetworks.service
Interface ValidationReport

public interface ValidationReport

A validation report is composed of validation items, each one characterized by a severity and a user message.

Message threshold property

A threshold property can be set so as to specify the maximum number of messages to include when performing a validation. It is defined by the property ebx.validation.messages.threshold in the EBX5 main configuration file.

This threshold is taken into account for each severity in each validation report. When the threshold is reached:

  • For severities 'error' and 'fatal', the validation is stopped;
  • For severities 'info' and 'warning', the validation continues without registering messages beyond this threshold. However, those messages are still counted in the total number of message, and messages of other severities can still be added.

When set to '0' or a negative value, the threshold is not taken into account. Default threshold is '0'.

See Also:
ValidationReportItem
